messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a class of 15 students. Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Gongxue are all connected to each other. Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Soheil are all connected to each other. Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Anisha are connected to each other. Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha are connected to each other. Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are connected to each other. Soheil is connected to Alice. Durga, Ajit and Anisha are connected to each other. Shanshan is connected to Vadim. Gongxue is connected to Alice. Ajit is connected to Anisha. You are connected with Vivian and a new app appears in which you can connect to anyone only once. From Vivian, what is the connection path that yields the most reward? Please list the student names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Connect to Vivian (starting point)
Step 2: Connect to Salma, Shanshan, or Vadim (as they are connected to Vivian)
Step 3: Connect to the remaining two students from step 2 (Salma, Shanshan, Vadim)
Step 4: Connect to Noah or Anisha (as they are connected to Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim)
Step 5: Connect to the remaining student from step 4 (Noah or Anisha)
Step 6: Connect to Abdul, Durga, or Ajit (as they are connected to Anisha)
Step 7: Connect to the remaining two students from step 6 (Abdul, Durga, Ajit)
Step 8: Connect to Pierre (as he is connected to Abdul, Durga, and Ajit)
Step 9: Connect to Soheil (as he is connected to Pierre)
Step 10: Connect to Solomon or Paul (as they are connected to Soheil)
Step 11: Connect to the remaining student from step 10 (Solomon or Paul)
Step 12: Connect to Alice (as she is connected to Solomon, Paul, and Soheil)
Step 13: Connect to Gongxue (as she is connected to Alice)

Answer: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Noah, Anisha, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Pierre, Soheil, Solomon, Paul, Alice, Gongxue

teleShortcut.parsed_response: Answer: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Noah, Anisha, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Pierre, Soheil, Solomon, Paul, Alice, Gongxue
